Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI was able to provide more flexibility and clarity regardin assignment structure and different approaches to writing assignments. It was more accessible than teaching staff.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I felt I could safety use GenAI with no judgement, however I do not feel the same way about my teachers, I could ask 'silly questions' without fear of judgement of my abilities from teaching staff.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI can be very formal, so then I asked GenAI to make my feedback *casual* and it delivered it in an understable, informal sense.
